summary: In the spring of 1939, Gilbert and Eleanor Kraus embarked on a risky and unlikely mission. Traveling into the heart of Nazi Germany, they rescued 50 Jewish children from Vienna and brought them to the United States.
cast: Alan Alda|Mamie Gummer|Liz Perle|Paul Shapiro|Robert Braun|Henny Wenkart|Paul Beller|Helga Milberg|Jonathan Sarna|Kurt Herman|Elizabeth Davis|Fritzi Nozik|Marsha L. Rozenblit|Kurt Admon|Guy Schless|Steven Kraus|Klara Lee
title: 50 niños: la misión de rescate del Sr. y la Sra. Kraus
